$eref.description: Represents a set of data used for machine learning in Jubatus.
$eref.title: datum

items.description: Input data represented in string. It is represented as key-value pairs of data. Name of keys cannot contain “$” sign.
items.title: string_values

items.description: Input data represented in numeric value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: num_values

items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: binary_values

items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: binary_values

___get_nearest_center.description: Returns nearest cluster center without adding point to cluster. This method is not supported in dbscan.
___get_nearest_center.title: get_nearest_center

items.title: point

___return.description: True when the point was added successfully

items.description: list of indexed_point for the points. indexed_point is a tuple of string id and datum
items.title: points

___get_core_members.description: Returns coreset of cluster in datum. This method is not supported in dbscan.
___get_core_members.title: get_core_members

___get_nearest_members_light.description: Returns nearest summary of cluster(coreset) from point. Its format is a list of tuples of weight and id. This method is not supported in dbscan.
___get_nearest_members_light.title: get_nearest_members_light
